channel.title: Help with Disconnections
channel.description:
[i][b][size=24pt][font=arial]What can I do to stop disconnecting? I use a differen't client like Hybrid PvP and its fine but not all items are correct. I am currently using Client and Source of ZigiScape. So I know its in the client Folders.[/font][/size][/b][/i] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/opbxqu.png[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/ftlh0p.png[/img]
[i][b][size=24pt][font=arial]These Java and Class files are in The Client Folder![/font][/size][/b][/i]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/qwy1pc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2a5hm9w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/jfiy5t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2h3v1q1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/dvm1id.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/mrqpn7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2eq9bbs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/23s7yts.png[/img]
